entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
